attributes.action: Call a General Election before the end of 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the current expenses scandal and the pledge by offending MP's to step down at the next election, we believe it is right for the PM to call a general election as soon as practically possible so that the public can elect new representatives or show support for their current representatives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
